FuncDef: The display fr statistics command displays statistics about sent and received data on an FR interface.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the type and number of an interface.
Currently, only POS interfaces are supported, excluding sub-interfaces.

Examples: Frame relay packet statistics for interface Pos1/0/0 (DTE)
Physical layer is Packet Over SONET, Scramble enabled, clock master, CRC-32, loopback: none
Last 300 seconds input rate: 61 bits/sec, 0 packets/sec
Last 300 seconds output rate: 61 bits/sec, 0 packets/sec
Input peak rate 0 bits/sec, Record time: -
Output peak rate 0 bits/sec, Record time: -
Input error: 0 shortpacket, 0 longpacket, 0 CRC, 0 lostpacket
ExtraInfo: To monitor interface status or locate an interface fault, run the display fr statistics command to check interface status and statistics. The command output helps you troubleshoot the interface fault.
